name: Planet X (Liz)
description:
Journey to Planet X, a hidden planet right here in the Milky Way galaxy, and discover your backstory. Were you a former space pirate, Lunzoran researcher, or lieutenant in an intergalactic war? What's the deal with Marty, the Octatian mechanic who employed you?  Whatever happened to his son? 

Find out by playing Planet X!

Fullscreen recommended. This work of interactive fiction was written in Twine SugarCube 2.21.0. 

Credits

Audio - audionautix.com

Story - revolverrob
